Two friends reused a prime in their RSA public keys. Intercept their encrypted messages and see if you can decipher 4333304256385450061837763472460129496797686635943600604884140393471397240787211793337467081154004724252691468820042942397032457543514954936467192598240597 using this shared vulnerability.

The flag format is flag{...}
n=6887022442395741443241062469397915530528785704135743899831967089739418370272363386789759991297358943645016230639610554761059278268843442964831847874266133, n2=5215479438542624836442980230306482508007137738849958851139966899381341849552920323304444232042421972344757134446056540502797639101581632612519413610317633, e=2576474758048319321982664971268955588884954642349452273342473053121424067286352742494314242668489893571139040060302291884086229031685891407850305319437677

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{uc9his3t}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 4333304256385450061837763472460129496797686635943600604884140393471397240787211793337467081154004724252691468820042942397032457543514954936467192598240597
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=6887022442395741443241062469397915530528785704135743899831967089739418370272363386789759991297358943645016230639610554761059278268843442964831847874266133, n2=5215479438542624836442980230306482508007137738849958851139966899381341849552920323304444232042421972344757134446056540502797639101581632612519413610317633, e=2576474758048319321982664971268955588884954642349452273342473053121424067286352742494314242668489893571139040060302291884086229031685891407850305319437677
extra_info: p=85839150723066595123889364406025681092168451357673012075275158608643815843941, q=80231716930827798983607117628870167600970042405794133882076219039222122428913, q2=60758749295746787557674321523866612660218679064660715072959683897538084970413, φ(n)=6887022442395741443241062469397915530528785704135743899831967089739418370272197315922106096903251447162981334790917416267295811122886091587183981935993280, φ(n2)=5215479438542624836442980230306482508007137738849958851139966899381341849552773725404425418659740408658827242152304153372375305374433397770013231709503280
subtype: shared_prime
archetype: rsa
